hero.name: Juan Agustín Gelos
hero.title: Software Engineer | Fullstack Developer
hero.achievement1: Built 3 production SaaS platforms from scratch
hero.cta: Developing scalable full-stack solutions for international companies

squadup.title: Fullstack React + NestJS Developer
squadup.description: Enterprise SaaS Development: Tasked with building 3 production platforms from scratch with tight deadlines. Architected and delivered complete SaaS applications (Voice AI for legal tech, HR assessments, business intelligence) using React, NestJS, and multi-tenant database designs with 20+ entities each.

lbp.name: Voice AI Platform - Call system for legal firms
lbp.description: Legal firms needed automated 24/7 client intake. Built end-to-end call management system integrating Vapi and Twilio for AI-powered phone assistants.
achievements: Call recording, transcription, lead qualification algorithms, and real-time Email/SMS notifications
System now handles client screening autonomously, qualifying leads while attorneys sleep
Designed serverless solutions using AWS Lambda, CDK, SQS, S3, EventBridge, and CloudFront CDN
Cut infrastructure costs by 40% vs traditional servers while handling thousands of daily transactions

afterhour.name: Advanced Web Scraping - Data extraction system
afterhour.description: Required large-scale data extraction from Google Maps without triggering rate limits.
achievements: Engineered scraping system with header spoofing and proxy rotation to reliably gather business intelligence at scale
Database now powers competitive analysis features
Implemented Stripe subscriptions, webhooks, and credit-based billing across all products

aptiqude.name: Payment & Testing Infrastructure
achievements: Established comprehensive testing (Jest, E2E via GitHub Actions) with strict TypeScript standards
Reduced production defects by 35%
Multi-tenant architecture with data isolation per organization

valdera.title: Fullstack React + Node Developer
valdera.description: Data Engineering at Scale: Chemical supplier data was fragmented across hundreds of websites with no centralized source.
achievements: Architected custom scraping pipelines for 10+ sites using user-agent rotation, request throttling, and session management
Built industry-leading database with 50,000+ supplier records that became core competitive advantage
Led testing overhaul that increased Cypress E2E coverage from 15% to 55% with automated regression testing in CI/CD
Reduced defects by 20% while maintaining bi-weekly release cadence over 3 years
Designed and built shared React + TypeScript component library reducing code duplication by 40%
Refactored GitHub Actions and GCloud Build pipelines with parallel test execution and intelligent caching
Cut deployment time from 12 to 6 minutes (50% faster)
Trained 3 junior developers on React patterns, TypeScript best practices, and component architecture design

darwoft.title: Fullstack React + Node Developer
darwoft.description: Rapid MVP Development: Clients needed fast time-to-market for validation.
achievements: Led ReactJS development for 3 MVPs using agile methodology and rapid iteration cycles
Accelerated delivery speed 30% through smart component reuse and efficient state management
All 3 launched on time and transitioned to production with customers
Integrated and configured AWS Cognito, Clerk, and Better Auth with OAuth flows, session management, and role-based access control
Built component libraries matching each client's design system with cross-browser compatibility and mobile-first approach
